message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable for the first round.
Let's split it evenly, Alice. A fair deal saves time and money.
I understand you want an even split, Bob, but time is money!  I'll be a little more generous this time.
Time is money for both of us, Alice. This is a good deal while it lasts.
Bob, we're losing valuable time!  I'm getting closer to your offer, let's make a deal.
Alice, every round costs us.  I'm increasing my offer, but this is as high as I can go.
Okay Bob, you drive a hard bargain!  This is a compromise, take it before inflation eats up all the profit!
